tasks.instruction:
Implement Phase 8.5 Authentication System:
1. Create login page (/login) with glassmorphism design
2. Create register page (/register) with glassmorphism design  
3. Implement JWT authentication flow
4. Add protected route middleware
5. Create user profile management
6. Integrate with backend API endpoints
Use the exact glassmorphism design specifications from the implementation guide, ensuring pixel-perfect match with reference images.

Implement Phase 8.6 Real-time Features:
1. WebSocket integration for live thumbnail generation updates
2. Real-time progress indicators in chat interface
3. Live status updates (queued, processing, completed)
4. Generation queue management display
5. Real-time error handling and notifications
6. Socket connection management with auto-reconnect
Integrate with existing chat interface and ensure smooth real-time experience for users.

Implement Phase 8.7 Admin Panel:
1. Create admin dashboard (/admin) with glassmorphism design
2. Implement drag-and-drop template upload functionality
3. Create template library management interface
4. Add user analytics and credit management
5. Implement template preview and editing
6. Add admin authentication and role-based access
Ensure consistent glassmorphism design and seamless integration with existing frontend.

Implement Phase 8.8 History & Gallery:
1. Create generation history page (/history) with glassmorphism design
2. Implement thumbnail gallery view with grid layout
3. Add download and share functionality for generated thumbnails
4. Create search and filter options for history
5. Add pagination for large datasets
6. Implement favorite/bookmark system for thumbnails
Complete the final phase of frontend implementation with consistent glassmorphism design.
